title: Ballot underway in parliament to select new Deputy Speaker
body_lines: A ballot is currently in progress in the parliament to vote in a new Deputy Speaker.
The name of MP Ranjith Siyambalapitiya was proposed by the Sri Lanka Freedom Party (SLFP) while the main opposition Samagi Jana Balawegaya (SJB) proposed the name of MP Imthiaz Bakeer Markar.
